mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_goods( leibiexiashuId, leibieId, mingcheng, jieshao, fujian, jiage, tejia, shifoutejia, del, saleflag, fbid )VALUES ( #{leibiexiashuId}, #{leibieId}, #{mingcheng}, #{jieshao}, #{fujian}, #{jiage}, #{jiage}, 'no', '0', '在售', #{fbid} )
mapper.select: SELECT id,name as mingcheng FROM t_leibie_xiashu WHERE leibie_id = #{leibieid} and del = '0'
